attributes.action: Sack Maria Miller as Culture Secretary
attributes.additional_details:
Maria Miller has breached parliamentary rules and has disgraced her office. She has brought Parliament into disrepute and is casting a stain on the standards of the MPs.

She has countenanced the intimidation of a national newspaper for her own personal advantage. It is disgraceful that she is responsible for the regulation of the free press of Britain.

At the very least she should be dismissed as Culture Secretary.

rejection.details: Expenses are a matter for the Parliamentary authorities.
